data.title: Tech Review SpaceCoin
data.description:
[https://github.com/spacecoinxyz/research/blob/main/publications/Blue-Paper-Spacecoinxyz.pdf](https://github.com/spacecoinxyz/research/blob/main/publications/Blue-Paper-Spacecoinxyz.pdf)

[Tech Review Document](https://docs.google.com/document/d/1Xdy1YBghSn_on5sTTkQ1Bhk-A65_GDkJh3w4tDPON2k/edit?tab=t.0)

**Scores:** Mainnet : 74.55% / 65.45%

**Notes:** 

* SpaceCoin.xyz integrates blockchain technology with satellite infrastructure to create a decentralized, space-based network.
* Utilizes Low Earth Orbit (LEO) satellites equipped with cryptographic modules as independent validators.
* Leverages the Iridium satellite network for reliable data transmission between terrestrial nodes and satellites.
* Employs a two-tiered blockchain design:
  * **Celestial Chain (Layer-1)**: An off-world blockchain deployed in space.
  * **Uncelestial Network (Layer-2)**: Terrestrial state chains interacting with the Celestial Chain.
* On December 21, 2024, launched the first satellite, CTC-0, aboard SpaceX's Falcon 9.
* Plans to deploy 7-10 additional satellites by 2025 to activate the Celestial Chain mainnet.
* Satellites are equipped with "crypto engines" and powered by solar panels.
* Nodes operate within satellite-cubes in orbit, making them tamper-proof and resistant to side-channel attacks.
* Space-based infrastructure offers enhanced resistance to DoS attacks and censorship.
* Published a Blue Paper on November 1, 2024, outlining the project's vision and technical details.
* Plans to launch additional satellites to expand network coverage and resilience.
* Aims to establish a native space economy, enabling satellites and future space entities to utilize a blockchain network as an interstellar marketplace.
* Competitors include:
  * **Cryptosat**: Focuses on secure cryptographic computation in space.
  * **Blockstream Satellite**: Broadcasts Bitcoin blockchain data via satellites.
  * **SpaceChain**: Integrates blockchain nodes with satellite technology for enhanced transaction security.
* SpaceCoin.xyz is pioneering the integration of blockchain technology with satellite infrastructure, aiming to create a resilient and tamper-proof decentralized network in space.

data.title: Tech Review TableLand Network
data.description:
[https://github.com/tablelandnetwork](https://github.com/tablelandnetwork)

Website: [https://tableland.xyz/rigs](https://tableland.xyz/rigs)

[**Tech Review Document**](https://docs.google.com/document/d/1Apky79J4EqR6LcEmcroiyXrlpTq1rkWyiBLz1TG_g0s/edit?tab=t.0)

Scores: 81.82%

**Notes:** 

* Initially started in 2022, no such activities on their git repos from mid 2024 except for one repo which is occasionally updated for a couple commits. 
* No active development and neither we have any active developers so its less than 3 and lost much scores there
* Further, the commits aren't made actively for almost an year now. 
* Decentralized SQL database network for Web3, enabling structured data storage onchain.
* Uses smart contracts for access control; tables are off-chain but cryptographically verifiable.
* Runs on EVM-compatible chains like Ethereum, Optimism, and Arbitrum.
* Tables managed by a decentralized validator network, ensuring tamper-proof data with cryptographic signatures.
* SQL-based, tamper-proof storage, composable with smart contracts.
* No native token launched.
* Mainnet live with active developer adoption.
* Competes with Ceramic Network (decentralized documents) and The Graph (indexing, not structured storage).

data.title: Market Research Strategies for Crypto Projects
data.description:
• Twitter/X – Track influencers, VCs, and early-stage projects using keyword alerts (e.g., AI agents, Web3 infra, ZK tech).

• Telegram & Discord – Join builder and investor groups to spot emerging projects.

• Crypto VC & Incubators – Follow funding rounds from a16z, Paradigm, Binance Labs, and Gitcoin Grants.

• GitHub & Open-Source – Monitor trending repos in AI, blockchain infra, and decentralized data projects.

• Crypto News & Research Platforms – Use Messari, Token Terminal, and Delphi Digital for industry trends.

• Launchpads & IDOs – Watch CoinList, Polkastarter, and DAOMaker for early-stage opportunities.

• Community Growth & Engagement – Analyze social media traction, developer activity, and partnerships.

data.title: Create TMAI Token Distribution Sheet
data.description:
**Description:**
I created the TMAI token distribution sheet by analyzing all transfers, vestings, and airdrops. I then matched the blockchain addresses with messages on Telegram and Slack and cross-referenced the amounts with various sheets shared with me. This comprehensive analysis provides a better tracking mechanism for the overall supply and distribution of TMAI tokens.

**Steps Taken:**

* **Data Extraction:** Collected data on transfers, vestings, and airdrops.
* **Address Matching:** Cross-verified blockchain addresses with Telegram and Slack messages.
* **Data Consolidation:** Merged figures from multiple shared sheets to ensure accuracy.
* **Sheet Creation:** Compiled the validated data into a single, comprehensive TMAI token distribution sheet.

**Outcome:**

* A verified distribution sheet that improves transparency and tracking of TMAI token supply.

**Next Steps:**

* Conduct a review of the sheet for any discrepancies.
* Share the updated sheet with the team and relevant stakeholders.
* Establish a process for ongoing updates as new data becomes available.

**Sheet -** [https://docs.google.com/spreadsheets/d/1SOEOH_tKbQ2Ouf7CkyAX0nvvxNJIwjZatajRPebz3O0/edit?gid=0#gid=0](https://docs.google.com/spreadsheets/d/1SOEOH_tKbQ2Ouf7CkyAX0nvvxNJIwjZatajRPebz3O0/edit?gid=0#gid=0)

data.title: Blockchain Engineer Onboarding Doc Discussion with Ayush, Talha, Chetan & Salman
data.description:
Discussion to edit the onboarding doc for Blockchain Engineer. There was confusion about whether there was an actual doc for this role, as the one shared by Favour appeared to be for the role of Blockchain Analyst. 

After a discussion with Ayush, Salman, Talha, and Chetan, I learned that the current doc needs to be more comprehensive, and we need to add more training resources for the development of the quiz.

issues.full_context:

Discussion to edit the onboarding doc for Blockchain Engineer. There was confusion about whether there was an actual doc for this role, as the one shared by Favour appeared to be for the role of Blockchain Analyst. 

After a discussion with Ayush, Salman, Talha, and Chetan, I learned that the current doc needs to be more comprehensive, and we need to add more training resources for the development of the quiz.

data.title: Tech Review - InkonChain
data.description:
[https://github.com/inkonchain](https://github.com/inkonchain)

[**Tech Score:**](https://docs.google.com/document/d/1ErslhfZydzsbPfJlBzYQMJf0lusipzY70kX_yqigtcg/edit?tab=t.0#heading=h.8jrzspj8atqv) 85.45%

**Notes:** 

* Active github development is happening from October onwards.
* Mainnet is live but no native token as ETH is native currency
* Layer 2 blockchain on Optimism OP Stack, backed by Kraken.
* Fastest OP L2 with sub-1 second block times and instant finality.
* First OP L2 supporting USDT0 natively.
* Direct Kraken exchange integration for unmatched liquidity.
* Optimism Superchain compatibility for seamless cross-chain transactions.
* Kraken-grade security leveraging OP Stack infrastructure.
* Relay-powered bridge supporting EVM & OP Superchain assets.
* Growing DeFi & institutional adoption due to liquidity and performance advantages.
* 418K website visits (Feb 2025), mainnet launched.
* Developer Grants backed by Kraken to fuel ecosystem growth.
* Key Apps:
  * Inkypump – Token launch protocol (pump.fun alternative).
  * Superswap – DEX aggregator.
  * Velodrome – Low-fee decentralized exchange.
  * The Deep – DeFi investment strategies platform.
* Explorer:[ Mainnet Explorer](https://explorer.inkonchain.com/)
* Faucet:[ Inkonchain Faucet](https://inkonchain.com/faucet)

comments.body:
@salman 

* Yes, it will be a blockchain so over 11%
* Major L2's have similar low fees and block finality, and have major marketshare. I would mark it as "Medium" in innovation.
* Yes, we can mark it as easy to use, since it is easy for Web3 users.
  
  For infra level code you can analysze on the basis of amount of code added by the team after the fork, based on the commit history

@ayush 

I have few questions since I'm currently reviewing [https://inkonchain.com/](https://inkonchain.com/)

* Since its a L2 Blockchain build on Superchain (OP Stack) and backed by kraken. So it will be marked over 11% since its a blockchain,
* Since its a blockchain that solves the block finality time, low gas fee, and provides usdt0 cross-chain stable coin support etc so its definitely unique and doing something innovative, so innovation point should be regular?
* Lastly, since its a blockchain so the end users will be the builders and they provided sufficient documentation for developers to study and get hands on to the development, secondly, they also provide cross-chain bridge on ink chain that can be used by web3 users so using a bridge is also simpler solution so I should mark this as easy to use?
  
  Also, if you look at their github, they have two to three main repos that can be analyzed however, if I need to analyze their infra level codebase then its forked from optimism so how can I review that code-base? Since, its forked and using optimism's codebase and we won't be able to study if what particular changes are made by ink team and where exactly those changes are replicated to thoroughly review for code quality: [https://github.com/inkonchain/optimism](https://github.com/inkonchain/optimism)
  [https://github.com/inkonchain](https://github.com/inkonchain)
  
  
  CC: @abdullah @manav

data.title: FR 8 - Manifest
data.description:
Manifest - 63.33%

Scorecard: [Manifest - FR Scoresheet](https://docs.google.com/spreadsheets/d/1nB4U-lGCBW2ez2qXzS4b4MISoD5Ht9iPbOxZGIESSns/edit?usp=sharing)

## Introduction:

* Manifest is a financial technology company that leverages blockchain technology to provide global investors with access to U.S. private equity real estate investments.
* We've emerged from leading crypto accelerators Alliance and CV Labs.
* Manifest operates under BVI and Cayman law and complies with relevant U.S. securities laws and financial regulations.
* Manifest brings institutional-grade U.S. real estate to investors worldwide through onchain ownership.

## Solution:

* By tokenizing real estate assets, Manifest facilitates scalable and liquid investments, offering exposure to U.S. home price appreciation without the burdens of direct property ownership.
* The return profile of HEIs stems from their unique structure.
* When Manifest makes an HEI investment, it receives 2x economic rights relative to its investment amount. This is called the “Equity Multiple.”
* For example, if Manifest invests $100,000 in a $1,000,000 home, it receives a 20% economic interest in the home's value (double the 10% that the investment represents of the home's value).
* This creates an immediate "paper gain" that translates into actual returns when the property is eventually sold, refinanced, or reaches the end of the HEI term.

## Innovation:

* Our first product is called $USH, an ERC-20 token that targets stable \~13% annual returns from American residential real estate equity.
* For the first time, American real estate can be used in a programmatic capacity onchain, similar in utility to stablecoins, but with a significantly higher native yield.
* Manifest harnesses blockchain technology so you can invest in a portfolio of diversified American real estate equity in under 30 seconds.
* With dramatically lower fees, deep secondary liquidity, and tax efficiency, Manifest opens institutional-grade real estate to everyone, everywhere — while providing full transparency, seamless DeFi composability, and unmatched simplicity.

## Use Case / Features:

* Our first product, $USH, provides exposure to U.S. residential real estate through Home Equity Investments (called “HEIs”).
* Home Equity Investments (called “HEIs”) are financial instruments that provide investment exposure to U.S. home price appreciation without the burden of ownership or property management.
* Unlike traditional real estate investments that require active management and dealing with tenants, HEIs offer a streamlined approach to gaining exposure to the U.S. housing market.
* Our protocol is designed to expand to other private market assets over time, always focusing on high-quality, institutional-grade investments with strong risk-adjusted returns.

## Traction:

* 

## Tokenomics:

* $USH is a yield generating ERC-20 token backed by a portfolio of HEIs.
* As the $USH Collateral Pool accumulates value, profits are reinvested in additional HEIs to grow the backing value per token and defer capital gains taxes.
* Distributions are ultimately made to $USH tokenholders when the $USH tokenholders vote to redeem their tokens.
* $USH is expected to increase in value approximately 13% annually. These returns accumulate in the token.
* Asset valuations and portfolio performance are calculated daily and recorded onchain, providing full transparency to the assets backing $USH tokens.

What are the main benefits of $USH?

* \~13% annual returns net
* Institutional-grade exposure to U.S. residential housing with improved liquidity and efficiency
* Access to off-market discounts of approximately 50% to fair-market home values
* Global accessibility; investments are possible in under 30 seconds
* A tax-efficient structure designed for perpetual tax deferral
* DeFi composability allowing tokens to be used across protocols for additional yield
* Real-time transparency with all assets recorded onchain
* Voting- $USH holders can vote on whether to redeem all their tokens for the value of the collateral real estate. $USH holders, through this limited right, control the value of their investment because they are able to determine when they will collectively receive the value of the backing assets.

* The first season of Manifest Points will commence in mid-2025.

* $USA is Manifest's governance token that enables community participation in protocol decisions. Token holders can propose and vote on key protocol decisions, including whether to initiate fees, that shape the future of the Manifest ecosystem.
* While $USH represents investment exposure to U.S. real estate assets, $USA is purely a governance token. $USH is backed by real-world assets and designed to appreciate with those assets, whereas $USA derives its value from the governance rights it confers over the Manifest protocol, protocol fee distributions, and its role in the broader ecosystem.
* Beyond governance rights, $USA provides the opportunity to earn rewards in the form of $USA token buybacks or staking. Future utility may include additional staking opportunities, discounts, and other rewards.
* $USA has a maximum supply cap of 100M tokens.

## Roadmap:

* 

## Business Model:

* Manifest expects to be able to generate returns of 16.0-17.5% on a portfolio of HEIs after:
  * Origination costs
  * Losses from defaults.
  * Costs from operations and servicing the portfolio of HEIs
  * Cash drag from holding limited cash equivalents for working capital and liquidity (cash equivalent holdings expected to be \~ 5% of TVL)
* Manifest governance may decide to apply additional fees. In the event of these fees, Manifest expects annual fees of approximately 2.0-3.0%.

## Go-To-Market:

* 

## Investors:

* $2.5M Pre-Seed in March 2025 from
  * **VanEck - 3**
  * **Lattice - 7**
  * **Compound - 9**
  * SALT

## Community:

* 1.4k on X
* 159 on Telegram 
* 255 on LinkedIn

## Competition: 

* 

## Team: 

* Manifest was founded by Nathaniel Sokoll-Ward and Robert V. Lee. Nathaniel, our CEO and Co-Founder, is a repeat founder who previously built and exited Roostify, which powered $600B/year in mortgages for major financial institutions like Chase and HSBC.
* Robert, our COO and Co-Founder, is a former Deloitte strategy consultant with 10 years of experience advising Fortune 500 companies on finance and innovation.

* With dramatically lower fees, deep secondary liquidity, and tax efficiency, Manifest opens institutional-grade real estate to everyone, everywhere — while providing full transparency, seamless DeFi composability, and unmatched simplicity.

## Use Case / Features:

* Our first product, $USH, provides exposure to U.S. residential real estate through Home Equity Investments (called “HEIs”).
* Home Equity Investments (called “HEIs”) are financial instruments that provide investment exposure to U.S. home price appreciation without the burden of ownership or property management.
* Unlike traditional real estate investments that require active management and dealing with tenants, HEIs offer a streamlined approach to gaining exposure to the U.S. housing market.
* Our protocol is designed to expand to other private market assets over time, always focusing on high-quality, institutional-grade investments with strong risk-adjusted returns.

## Traction:

* 

## Tokenomics:

* $USH is a yield generating ERC-20 token backed by a portfolio of HEIs.
* As the $USH Collateral Pool accumulates value, profits are reinvested in additional HEIs to grow the backing value per token and defer capital gains taxes.
* Distributions are ultimately made to $USH tokenholders when the $USH tokenholders vote to redeem their tokens.
* $USH is expected to increase in value approximately 13% annually. These returns accumulate in the token.
* Asset valuations and portfolio performance are calculated daily and recorded onchain, providing full transparency to the assets backing $USH tokens.

What are the main benefits of $USH?

* \~13% annual returns net
* Institutional-grade exposure to U.S. residential housing with improved liquidity and efficiency
* Access to off-market discounts of approximately 50% to fair-market home values
* Global accessibility; investments are possible in under 30 seconds
* A tax-efficient structure designed for perpetual tax deferral
* DeFi composability allowing tokens to be used across protocols for additional yield
* Real-time transparency with all assets recorded onchain
* Voting- $USH holders can vote on whether to redeem all their tokens for the value of the collateral real estate. $USH holders, through this limited right, control the value of their investment because they are able to determine when they will collectively receive the value of the backing assets.

* The first season of Manifest Points will commence in mid-2025.

* $USA is Manifest's governance token that enables community participation in protocol decisions. Token holders can propose and vote on key protocol decisions, including whether to initiate fees, that shape the future of the Manifest ecosystem.
* While $USH represents investment exposure to U.S. real estate assets, $USA is purely a governance token. $USH is backed by real-world assets and designed to appreciate with those assets, whereas $USA derives its value from the governance rights it confers over the Manifest protocol, protocol fee distributions, and its role in the broader ecosystem.
* Beyond governance rights, $USA provides the opportunity to earn rewards in the form of $USA token buybacks or staking. Future utility may include additional staking opportunities, discounts, and other rewards.
* $USA has a maximum supply cap of 100M tokens.

## Roadmap:

* 

## Business Model:

* Manifest expects to be able to generate returns of 16.0-17.5% on a portfolio of HEIs after:
  * Origination costs
  * Losses from defaults.
  * Costs from operations and servicing the portfolio of HEIs
  * Cash drag from holding limited cash equivalents for working capital and liquidity (cash equivalent holdings expected to be \~ 5% of TVL)
* Manifest governance may decide to apply additional fees. In the event of these fees, Manifest expects annual fees of approximately 2.0-3.0%.

## Go-To-Market:

* 

## Investors:

* $2.5M Pre-Seed in March 2025 from
  * **VanEck - 3**
  * **Lattice - 7**
  * **Compound - 9**
  * SALT

## Community:

* 1.4k on X
* 159 on Telegram 
* 255 on LinkedIn

## Competition: 

* 

## Team: 

* Manifest was founded by Nathaniel Sokoll-Ward and Robert V. Lee. Nathaniel, our CEO and Co-Founder, is a repeat founder who previously built and exited Roostify, which powered $600B/year in mortgages for major financial institutions like Chase and HSBC.
* Robert, our COO and Co-Founder, is a former Deloitte strategy consultant with 10 years of experience advising Fortune 500 companies on finance and innovation.

data.title: FR 7 - Stoffel MPC
data.description:
Stoffel MPC - 

Scorecard: [Stoffel MPC - FR Scoresheet](https://docs.google.com/spreadsheets/d/11frs4Ba0JehsiKw7kHRVICAKTa3KLBTVT2jBrBMDamQ/edit?usp=sharing)

## Introduction:

* Stoffel is a platform that enables developers to build privacy-first applications using Multi-Party Computation (MPC) technology.

## Solution:

* Stoffel is a virtual machine architecture designed specifically for secure Multi-Party Computation (MPC) applications. It provides a flexible and efficient foundation for executing MPC protocols while maintaining protocol agnosticism.

## Innovation:

* MPC allows computations on private data without revealing the data itself, ensuring privacy and eliminating single points of trust. 
* Stoffel abstracts the complexities of cryptographic protocols, allowing developers to focus on application logic without deep cryptographic knowledge.

## Use Case / Features:

* The virtual machine is designed to be protocol-agnostic for several reasons:
* **Flexibility:**
  * Support for different MPC protocols without architectural changes
  * Easy integration of new protocols as they are developed
  * Ability to switch protocols based on specific requirements
* **Future-Proofing:**
  * Not tied to limitations of specific protocols
  * Can adapt to advances in MPC research
  * Supports hybrid protocol approaches

data.title: FR 6 - Hibit
data.description:
Hibit - 67.62%

Scorecard: [Hibit - FR Scoresheet](https://docs.google.com/spreadsheets/d/10IPEF3k523xJ8KvLHgyKhWbQbBS4_XAUUhap3Qt5Hog/edit?usp=sharing)

## Introduction:

* A Layer-1 blockchain for AI agents and next-gen fintech, featuring a native Layer-2 DEX for seamless, low-cost, and high-speed trading for Omni-Chain.

## Solution:

* Hibit is a seamless, independent Layer 2 that connects TON, Kaspa, Solana, ETH, BTC, BNB, ICP, and more, offering the most secure cross-chain solution—without relying on bridges.
* The Next Generation DEX Tailored for Ton Ecosystem with Omni-Chain Compatibility.
* Hibit is a next-generation Layer-1 blockchain built for a future where AI agents autonomously interact, transact, and evolve.
* Unlike traditional blockchains that primarily focus on financial applications, Hibit is engineered to support the AI-first Web3 economy.
* By offering omni-chain interoperability, AI-driven smart contracts, and a robust trading system, Hibit aims to break down the barriers between public chains, Web2 and Web3, AI and real-world applications.

## Innovation:

* Hibit is a Layer1 blockchain for AI agents, and its ecosystem includes Layer-2 infrastructure, Hibit DEX, full-chain interoperability technology, and AI Agent economy.
* Hybrid Consensus Protocol
  * At the core of Hibit’s Layer-1 infrastructure lies the Hybrid Consensus Protocol (HCP), which integrates blockchain security with close to unlimited scalability.
  * By decoupling transaction validation from execution, HCP achieves an unprecedented balance of decentralization, scalability, and security.
* AI-Powered Liquidity & Order Matching Engine

## Use Case / Features:

* Our Hibit DEX is the first major product of Hibit Layer 2 ecosystem, combining CEX-level performance with DEX decentralization to deliver 1M+ TPS, permissionless listings, and deep integration with AI Agents and Meme communities.

**Hibit L1 Features:**

* AI-Native Smart Contracts and Tokenized AI Agents
* Omni-Chain Interoperability and Cross-Chain Infrastructure
* AI-Driven Liquidity, Payments, and Trading Infrastructure
* Autonomous AI Device Economy
* AI-Sovereign DAOs & On-Chain Autonomous Governance

## Traction:

* Traffic on the main website 

* Traffic on the app

## Tokenomics:

* Hibit offers an enticing rewards program where users earn points based on their engagement and transactions across the platform. These points reflect your active participation and can be exchanged for a share in platform revenue

## Roadmap:

* Coming soon: Airdrops, node sales, and our TGE later this year.

**2025 Milestones**

* **AI-Integrated Layer-1 Blockchain:** Launch of AI-first smart contracts, enabling fully autonomous AI-driven governance, payments, and identity verification.
* **Expansion of AI Models:** Deployment of on-chain machine learning, deep learning, and reinforcement learning models for real-time AI applications.
* **Public Chain Upgrades:** Enhancing Hibit’s interoperability with Kaspa, Ethereum, Solana, Polkadot, and new AI-driven dApps.
* **AI-Driven Tokenomics:** Introduction of AI-optimized incentive models, ensuring sustainable growth and adoption.
* **Global Scalability:** Expansion of Hibit’s infrastructure to support billions of AI transactions per second.

**Beyond 2025**: **A Fully Autonomous AI Economy**

* **AI-Native Financial Services:** AI-powered lending, automated insurance, and self-optimizing investment protocols.
* **AI-Driven DePIN Networks:** Decentralized robotics, logistics, and supply chain management powered by AI agents.
* **Cross-Industry AI DAOs:** Fully autonomous AI corporations governed by on-chain smart contracts.
* **Omni-Chain AI Mesh Networks:** AI-driven ecosystems where data, transactions, and decision-making occur in a fully decentralized manner.

## Business Model:

* Transaction fee rate is 0.3% without any other charges.
* Layer-2 has no gas fees.
* Hibit enables 0 gas trading of all BTC ecosystem assets, such as BRC20 tokens.

## Go-To-Market:

* 

## Investors:

* $5M in March 2025 from
  * **Waterdrip Capital - 8**
  * Bochsler Finance
  * BetterverseDAO
  * Bo Shen - 0
  * Nvidia

## Community:

* 9.9k on X

## Competition: 

* 

## Team: 

* Our team includes MIT alumni and founders of a top 10 global CEX (2013-2017), bringing deep expertise in exchange infrastructure and innovation.

data.title: FR 5 - Offline Protocol
data.description:
Offline Protocol - 65.24%

Scorecard: [Offline Protocol - FR Scoresheet](https://docs.google.com/spreadsheets/d/13Tg8FvER9k4Cfgy3SQ_iXuIma7ZZ2tsK_Nwjgi9gr6Y/edit?usp=sharing)

## Introduction:

* Offline Protocol is a censorship-resistant technology stack designed to enable financial transactions, communication, and privacy in environments without constant internet connectivity.

## Solution:

* We provide innovative, offline-first solutions that include everything from private social profiles (OfflineID) to developer tooling and infrastructure. 
* The technology is applicable in areas with limited infrastructure, during localized outages, or in situations where users minimize internet usage.

## Innovation:

* It utilizes offline networking, decentralized cryptography, and local serverless circumvention to allow smartphones to form local mesh networks.
* This enables transactions and communication without relying on active internet or telecommunication services.
* We use proprietary offline-first technology to ensure secure, resilient, and private interactions across our ecosystem.

## Use Case / Features:

* Our products are designed to function seamlessly without the need for constant internet access, enabling users to control their data while maintaining full communication capabilities.
* **Offline ID:**
  * **Portable social profiles that work without internet**
  * OfflineID is your universal identity—connecting your devices, wallets, and social ties into a single, censorship-resistant profile. It’s privacy-first, fully portable, and works seamlessly without an active connection.
  * **Offering near-zero percent fees for unparalleled value, significantly lower than competitors.** 
* **Coming soon: Offline Infra, App Layer, ID SDK**
* **Fernweh: Fernweh empowers you to explore and connect without boundaries. Share moments, hyper-local alerts, and communicate seamlessly — all without relying on internet connectivity.**
* **OfflinePay: OfflinePay ensures financial freedom in any situation. Make secure transactions, transfer funds, or accept payments without requiring internet access or centralized banking systems.**

data.title: Give Feedback for Token Metrics AI Chatbot (Abdullah)
data.description:
We need to annotate (give feedback) our Token Metrics AI chatbot answers across both Twitter and our production/development environments. This will help us improve the chatbot's performance and gather valuable insights. The CS team should use the provided video tutorial to guide them through the annotation process.

## Objectives

1. Annotate AI chatbot responses on Twitter
2. Annotate AI chatbot responses on the production environment
3. Annotate AI chatbot responses on the development environment

## Steps

1. Review the attached video tutorial on LangSmith annotation

   [Jam | Console logs, network requests, and more](https://jam.dev/c/30d4cd6d-aa1c-4499-be2f-a166294f0f8e)
2. Access the LangSmith dashboard for Token Metrics using your TM email.
3. Identify and categorize chatbot interactions for annotation
4. Provide feedback and annotations for each interaction
5. Use LangSmith's built-in tools to rate response quality, accuracy, and relevance
6. Document any patterns or issues discovered during the annotation process

## Additional Notes

* Ensure consistency in annotation across all team members
* Focus on both positive and negative examples to provide a balanced dataset
* Pay special attention to edge cases and unique user queries
* Regularly discuss findings with the AI development team to inform improvements

## Success Criteria

* Complete annotation of at least 100 interactions each for Twitter, production, and development environments
* Identify at least 5 areas for improvement in chatbot responses
* Provide a summary report of annotation insights and recommendations

## Resources

* Video tutorial: [https://jam.dev/c/30d4cd6d-aa1c-4499-be2f-a166294f0f8e](https://jam.dev/c/30d4cd6d-aa1c-4499-be2f-a166294f0f8e)
* Access credentials for LangSmith dashboard: Use your TM email

Please update this issue with progress and any questions that arise during the annotation process.

data.title: Tech Review Exo Labs
data.description:
## Scorecard : [Exo Labs Scorecard](https://docs.google.com/spreadsheets/d/1BZvfMBf1_fMIXxJMz_THxVyJtVkSz-EqgCRlQcb4Wao/edit?gid=0#gid=0)

## Notes

* EXO powers AI you control—secure, scalable, local.
* EXO began with a simple goal: to speed up AI research experiments using whatever devices a few university students had on hand. 
*  an [automated benchmarking suite and website](https://benchmarks.exolabs.net/) offering detailed performance data for running LLMs on consumer hardware. These are transparent benchmarks on real devices, not estimates.
* At its core, EXO uses a technique called pipeline parallel inference. We take an LLM and split it into multiple "shards" - essentially contiguous slices of the model's layers. Each shard gets assigned to a different device. Devices can be different accelerators on the same machine like a GPU, CPU, or even NPU, or can be physically separate machines connected over a network.
* Each device processes its assigned layers sequentially, and the activations flow naturally to the next device. When processing a request, a request flows through these shards in order
* When the first request arrives, the first device starts processing it immediately. Shortly after, a second request arrives and since the first device has already finished processing the first request and passed the output to the second device, the first device is available to start processing the second request immediately. This delicate balance of processing and passing outputs (known as scheduling) continues until the final node is hit and a token is output. In this case the average device utilisation is 50% since 50% of the devices are active at any given time.
* One particular extension we're exploring is 'Tensor Parallelism', which could improve single-request throughput in cases where pipeline parallelism doesn't help (such as when the model fits in memory, as seen above).
* Running an EXO-style open-source agent that runs entirely on your own devices would've been impossible just a few years ago. Today, we're excited to announce that we've implemented an open-source agent that can perform actions for you, just like Alexa:
  *  [https://x.com/exolabs/status/1872788772779376777](https://x.com/exolabs/status/1872788772779376777)
  * We have built the first two integrations: WebOS TV and Tapo Smart Plug. We are working towards a full EXOcortex, where you can ask EXO to do anything you want and trust that it will act in a way that is aligned with you. For that, we need more integrations, so we're asking the community for suggestions for function call integrations. This could be anything from sending emails to controlling your coffee machine - we want your suggestions.
* At EXO, we've been working on ternary models for a while. In April 2024, we released [MLX-BitNet](https://github.com/exo-explore/mlx-bitnet) for efficient running on Apple Silicon. We [presented the first ever implementation of a BitNet for protein language modeling at ICML 2024](https://icml.cc/virtual/2024/35920) and are working on a larger BitNet model for protein modeling.
* EXO Private Search
  * We are taking signups for access to the API endpoint if you would like to integrate EXO private search into your app.
  * Architecture overview of private search with homomorphic encryption. The query is encrypted before being sent to the server, which processes it without being able to see the contents. The encrypted results are sent back to the client for decryption.
* , EXO Gym provides a similar toolkit for distributed training research. Like its predecessor, it offers benchmark problems and a common interface for testing and comparing new algorithms.
  * EXO Gym lowers the barrier to entry in distributed training research through an evolving collection of simulators that run on a single machine. For example, diloco-sim simulates the DiLoCo algorithm by training on N simulated nodes locally, abstracting away the complexity of maintaining a real distributed system.
* The EXO Desktop App has native support for SMS via the Messages app. You can download the latest version [here](https://github.com/exo-explore/exo). In the app you can enable the integration by selecting "Enable iMessage integration" in the Menu Bar.
  * We've integrated this directly into the EXO Desktop App so it's as frictionless as it possibly could be. It's one click to give the EXO Desktop App control of your phone. It works by controlling the iPhone mirroring instance on your mac.
* evML is a technique for verifying the results produced by a network of edge devices. It's cost-effective (only 5% overhead) and provides strong security guarantees. Additionally, it provides some privacy guarantees. Crucially, the barrier to joining an evML network is negligible.

![](https://lh7-rt.googleusercontent.com/docsz/AD_4nXcEVdMxogX8KYA1lD-bW3E5caaE9fl9-4T5lN3IzoSFw8e65h17vucygRhgFWjJ6sOYAx5NVePUA-mjACSlZ00uCV52QpUZq01Uc8kY0xfU4kIWuFT3ZeR_bZWzpRAOaS6xnKf5ew?key=PR33WBXP1VBqYm1epiDsNUzJ)

![](https://lh7-rt.googleusercontent.com/docsz/AD_4nXfaHQIKcaq10A_yRTd6d43CpWugZh17oi_H59CtyUON6sMffjolUouYVtbh2tTfg3xy4BMJ3odiBU8i5VIxmtBd82URf-4aWYlESffAwKv3yEpouDDBQQ3B5ALzDHhtqDX5xcnV_Q?key=PR33WBXP1VBqYm1epiDsNUzJ)

data.title: Tech Review: Titan Network
data.description:
## Scorecard : [Titan Network Scorecard](https://docs.google.com/spreadsheets/d/18c4jdeImS8k7o98_DW1GHr8-dtYJfRm0vaSXgO91bTM/edit?gid=0#gid=0)

## Notes

* DePIN Cloud Services
* Matching idle community resources with global demand. Easily leverage the power of DePIN and participate in the Internet of Value. 
* We build an ecosystem for crowdsourcing digital resources to accelerate the decentralization of the Internet as a universal public good. We restore community digital resource ownership through a transparent, open-source and incentivized platform that enables the de-siloing of products, services, and identities that live in the digital world.
* we build a DePIN platform for the aggregation of fungible digital resources, like compute, storage and bandwidth. We enable the ecosystem to utilize the full potential of their physical infrastructure and get rewarded for sharing the resources they have. The ultimate vision is to become the one-stop-shop platform for DePIN services both on the contributor and consumer side.
* d network design ensure that the community is rewarded for the committed resources while end-users receive high-quality results at the reliability level of modern cloud solutions.
* Additionally, its open source and low barrier for entry enables anyone in the ecosystem to participate in and benefit from the construction of the value internet.
* In this open ecosystem, anyone should be able to contribute to the decentralized pool of digital resources and benefit from its utilization.We will be the masters of our own digital resources, fully tapping into and using these resources to bring maximum value to ourselves and the entire community. 
* Our advantages
  * Fast Transmission Speeds
  * Low cost
  * Decentralization
  * Distributed Storage
  * Privacy Protection
  * High Availability
  * Self-repairing
  * Energy saving and emission reduction
* Titan Network is honored to announce the launch of our fourth test network — Galileo Testnet. 
  * jAN 6
  * Focus on PCDN sector, prioritizing China and Southeast Asian markets
  * TNT4 Nodes Incentive Mechanism
* A Validator Node is a key component of the Titan Blockchain network, responsible for validating transactions and maintaining the security and integrity of the blockchain. Each Validator node ensures that all nodes agree on the consistency of the state of the blockchain and the authenticity of the data by participating in a consensus mechanism (e.g. Tendermint).

data.description:
## Scorecard : [IRYS Scorecard](https://docs.google.com/spreadsheets/d/1arGqpkR_nce3A8LHxmGWaRyuFTRKql56XlIFElJhHp8/edit?gid=0#gid=0)

## Notes

* Irys is a high-performance data network, letting you store large amounts of data in a decentralized network while also tapping into a suite of data primitives such as IP/licensing which is currently used for selling data to hedge funds/ai companies etc
* IRYS stores data but faster, cheaper, and with a native execution layer  That makes data programmable
* Data on can be embedded with instructions retrieved instantly and shared across applications Enabling developers to build onchain services that leverage each other's data to unlock new value
* The demand for high-performance onchain data is surging across AI, IP, and consumer applications, but today’s infrastructure wasn’t built to handle it. Irys meets this need by unlocking a network of composable utilities—where data is structured, shared, and monetized across applications. More data fuels more services, creating compounding value and accelerating adoption.
* A datachain is a blockchain designed for one task: storing data. 
  * The early datachains solved one clear problem: the need for economical onchain storage. But while they excelled at storing information, they stopped there. A stored piece of data remains just that—stored. It isn’t part of any system where it can react, interact, or fuel other applications.
  * Iris:the world's first programmable datachain, where data doesn't just exist; it becomes active, fluid, valuable across applications. And it's this evolution—from passive to programmable—that marks the true primitive.
*  programmable data 
  * On Irys, data is equipped with instructions, carrying specific properties and rules as it moves across applications. This means that data can actively execute ownership rights, enforce royalty structures, uphold encryption standards, or even carry interaction rules with other applications.
  * What makes this kind of programmable data possible on Irys? It’s the native pathway between the data layer and IrysVM, allowing instructions to be executed directly onchain at a fraction of the typical cost. Unlike traditional execution chains where fragmentation and offchain solutions drive up costs, Irys provides a fully integrated, affordable approach. Everything happens onchain, reducing the headaches of working with data on first-generation datachains, while also opening new possibilities for applications and use cases that would otherwise be prohibitively expensive to build.
* Verifiability
  * All data on Irys goes through a multi-step process to establish reliability. The process begins in the Submit Ledger, a temporary holding area where incoming data is uploaded by users and verified by the protocol.Once data has been verified as uploaded in the Submit ledger, it’s “promoted” to the Publish Ledger, where it gains permanent status.
  * This promotion comes with a Ingress proofs—a certification that the data was accurately uploaded and that a responsible party is accountable for its storage. This process confirms both the reliability of the data and its accessibility across the network.
  * Matrix Packaging serves as the protocol’s mechanism for verifying that each miner contributes unique and provable storage capacity to the network.
  * Matrix Packaging bridges miner incentives and network reliability, creating a system where data storage is both efficient and provable—enabling scalable and actionable verifiability.
  * When new data is uploaded to the network or shared between miners, each miner generates a cryptographic proof of ingress. These proofs serve as verifiable records, ensuring data has been accurately uploaded, logged, and replicated.
* IrysVM 
  * IrysVM is the virtual machine at the heart of Irys, built to make smart contracts and data work together efficiently and directly. 
  * IrysVM offers the same benefits as an Ethereum Virtual Machine, but with a unique advantage: it’s built for direct access to Irys’s data ledgers
  * The main advantage of IrysVM is that it allows developers to attach specific properties to data and have them be programmable, making it useful across applications without requiring that programability and data storage reside in separate protocols. 
  * this means data on Irys can carry out tasks like enforcing ownership rights, automating royalties, managing access permissions, verifying uploaded data, and effectively executing any pre-defined instructions within the smart contract.
  * IrysVM’s design, storage and smart contract transactions are kept on separate processing lanes. This prevents the typical competition for blockspace that can drive up costs on other blockchains. Developers gain predictable transaction costs and stability, even as storage needs increase, making it simpler to scale applications over time.
* Consensus
  * Irys uses a consensus model that combines Proof of Work with Proof of Staking
    * Stake-Activated Mining: Miners must stake resources to activate a mining address on the network, signaling their commitment.
    * Controlled Hashpower Distribution: The protocol enforces that no mining address can control more than 10% of the network’s mining hashpower. This ensures power remains distributed and controls the risk of a single entity dominating the network.
    * Graduated Commitments: Adding a new partition to an existing mining address is significantly more cost-effective than creating a new address. This design makes it uneconomical for miners to operate multiple mining addresses, removing any financial incentive to do so.
* **The IRYS token is composed of four core components:**
  * **$IRYS**: The $IRYS token is the Irys platform native asset.
  * **Fees**: Fees are charged on[ all network operations](https://docs.irys.xyz/learn/protocol-overview/transactions-overview), including payment for data storage and protocol execution. Unlike other datachains, both temporary and permanent data storage fees are pegged to a USD range and updated on a yearly basis.
  * **Security**: Token rewards are used to incentivize node validators contributing to[ Irys consensus](https://docs.irys.xyz/learn/protocol-overview/irys-consensus-overview) and to prevent spam and denial-of-service attacks.
  * **Endowment:** $IRYS is used to fund the endowment, which covers miners’ future liabilities
  * **Staking**: Miners must [lock $IRYS tokens as collateral](https://docs.irys.xyz/learn/network-overview/becoming-a-miner-on-irys), signaling their commitment to the network and creating clear economic consequences for failing to uphold their responsibilities. Users will also be able to delegate $IRYS tokens in order to passively participate in contributing to the network’s security model.

![](https://lh7-rt.googleusercontent.com/docsz/AD_4nXfANxU308iDDWO2Pqi_BxrM-aQjCRR8DNsZUIoDoIt_HkdZrTYqbtK5pf_mq4ScXMqj0k-o92Aw3L89KWzRVQoaT9Qvu7YRPjTt9SRlzRVEFy26qlGj3PdebKdALg7ZFyqfj9jclA?key=D-nCx7wl_BXvpGFEqOKoYmoZ)

![](https://lh7-rt.googleusercontent.com/docsz/AD_4nXcwk7nqaC7tttR7wqdVGpEY02I3cBlJI4rMJDpE2h3agpkjyODoIA6ZMDq16OEKFy8TMONioV0ZWsS5ZCDWBHyhJ9cCeuUlFGEl23ljBMHAt-HFgsFSmIJOZMlJudjUzhqqinfeKw?key=D-nCx7wl_BXvpGFEqOKoYmoZ)

![](https://lh7-rt.googleusercontent.com/docsz/AD_4nXdJuba_SAsJVqY_iJVLoDK1UHBoJfSap0Qf-3M_ZmU0VtGHebXFkn7E134exusidZPoPk9IvYmLHQ8tSrpOfeNgv6dbCJ9csbQyNGOi6h5McbOpQOjkqR3mkwdc3pt966l0hfI-Pw?key=D-nCx7wl_BXvpGFEqOKoYmoZ)

data.title: Tech Review - Somnia Network
data.description:
## Scorecard : [Somnia Network Scorecard](https://docs.google.com/spreadsheets/d/1g69Zin6vB6Somp3INElDbcPnqVe63pA9F24ccUcTC8I/edit?gid=0#gid=0)

## Notes

* The fastest and most cost-efficient EVM-compatible Layer 1 for a fully Onchain World
* 400k  TPS: Somnia’s novel multistream conensus and super fast custom database IceDB. Enables the highest throughput lowest latency EVM compatible chain.
* Somnia takes EVM bytecode and compiles it. This makes execution superfast but also means you can use all the tools and code in the EVM ecosystem.
* Somnia’s New IceDB database allows for more predictable gas pricing. This allows Somnia to deliver sub-cent transaction fees, allowing for more logic to run on-chain.
* Somnia’s chain design, along with some Solidity extensions, allows developers to react to data changes and events fully on-chain. This allows for new real-time reactive on-chain apps.
* Reactive decentralized applications
  * Somnia introduces a new set of reactive primitives to Solidity enabling:
    * Fully on-chain games with more complex logic that are easier and faster to develop
    * Real-time prediction markets that react to verifiable on-chain events in real-time
    * Real-time consumer targeting based on on-chain interactions and dApp usage
* Mass Consumer and Real-Time Applications
  * Somnia’s performance and cost enable a new class of decentralized applications that can now have all their data and logic on-chain:
    * SocialFI - Moving all the data and logic of social networks on-chain. Enabling user sovereignty, greater composability and transparency of social algorithms.
    * On-chain games - Games to moving logic and data off-chain on-chain. Enabling user ownership and composable games that can be built faster and last forever.
    * Metaverses fully on-chain - Enabling full economies with mass UGC items and experience to be created on-chain. Fully own your experience and your economy.
* Somnia Testnet is Live
  * Somnia Announces $10 Million Grant Program in Anticipation of Devnet Launch


  * Somnia has four key innovations in blockchain architecture to achieve this performance level:
    * [Accelerated Sequential Execution](https://docs.somnia.network/somnia-blockchain/accelerated-sequential-execution) - through compiled EVM bytecode.
      * By translating EVM bytecode to highly optimised native code, Somnia achieves execution speeds close to hand-written C++ contracts, facilitating the execution of millions of transactions per second on a single core.
      * Somnia includes its own EVM compiler, which translates EVM bytecode to x86. This approaches near-native speed (native speed being the equivalent functionality handwritten in C++
    * [IceDB](https://docs.somnia.network/somnia-blockchain/somnias-icedb) - a faster, more predictable database for storing blockchain state.
      * Somnia has a custom database called IceDB. It employs performance reports for predictable read and write performance as well as a custom database architecture that enables average read/write operations 15-100 nanoseconds with built in snapshotting.
      * It has three key properties:
        * Deterministic performance
        * In-memory cache with read promotions
        * Built-in snapshotting
        * 
    * [MultiStream consensus](https://docs.somnia.network/somnia-blockchain/multistream-consensus) - a proof-of-stake, partially synchronous BFT protocol inspired by [Autobahn BFT](https://arxiv.org/pdf/2401.10369).
      * Independent Data Chains - Each validator operates its own blockchain, or “data chain,” which allows for independent block production. This unique approach eliminates the need for a consensus mechanism within individual data chains, streamlining the data processing workflow.
      * Consensus Chain - A separate blockchain aggregates the heads of all data chains, employing a modified PBFT algorithm for proof of stake consensus. This structure decouples data production from the consensus process, significantly enhancing overall efficiency.
    * [Advanced compression techniques](https://docs.somnia.network/somnia-blockchain/advanced-compression-techniques) - to deal with increased node-to-node data traffic due to the throughput.
      * The Somnia data chain architecture is designed to enable streaming compression in order to maximise data throughput. Somnia combines this with [BLS signature](https://www.ietf.org/archive/id/draft-irtf-cfrg-bls-signature-05.html) aggregation in order to achieve extremely high compression ratios, allowing for massive transaction data throughput
  * Somnia is supported by [Improbable](https://www.improbable.io/) and [MSquared](https://msquared.io/). Improbable will develop some of the key technical components of Somnia, including the Blockchain, but the project will require a large and active community to fulfil its vision.
  * The Somnia protocols aim to address three key challenges: enabling the free movement of users and assets, facilitating unrestricted commerce, and accelerating the composability of experiences and objects.
  * We currently have 2 major protocols that will be released:
    * SOM0 - Enabling interoperability of assets and their commercialization
    * SOM1 - Enabling composable virtual assets and experiences

![](https://lh7-rt.googleusercontent.com/docsz/AD_4nXcS1Ld7MjHKdQg2-Zg0w954hVryM0aIDfBcTc-H0mGyHAQ9kmf0eRjIEDX9u6Fru9YJtrcIShN7NCKsIhYf-cl2vj2fEHbUwkQtnlSIrNXJ1K8vsyAIeNyQwIqgQVMjvOk6H9BuKw?key=5hlMXgAbS16YW7VPdMIOGzhs)

![](https://lh7-rt.googleusercontent.com/docsz/AD_4nXckQaSBOTDm3_vlIJ2-bWpNdAYME7ASISqjnbsdaKKxYg5vfeXDwSIoQO4lDh7i5tJfEpUEMVc2qvHiDgu5OPk41NyZFhYx2mUIKPVVx8KKAG3etBR9YaA8JCn-1H0m0vg5_7OmPQ?key=5hlMXgAbS16YW7VPdMIOGzhs)

Somnia combines this with [BLS signature](https://www.ietf.org/archive/id/draft-irtf-cfrg-bls-signature-05.html) aggregation in order to achieve extremely high compression ratios, allowing for massive transaction data throughput

data.title: FR 4 - Sogni.ai
data.description:
Sogni AI - 71.90%

Scorecard: [Sogni.ai - FR Scoresheet](https://docs.google.com/spreadsheets/d/1dEsjfrBJCFD_HM8r-y_kVESbt2jJXQ1kjQ38QpqMLyw/edit?usp=sharing)

## Introduction:

* The Most Powerful Creative AI DePIN Protocol
* Live testnet 
* On-demand decentralized GPU power
* Generates 16 images at once within five seconds 
* Create-to-Earn 🤝 Compute-to-Earn
* **A Purpose-Built DePIN Protocol for Creative AI**
* Built on Base
* The Fastest Generative AI DePIN Network

## Solution:

* Sogni is a platform designed to support creative expression through a decentralized **Supernet.**
  * Sogni Supernet is a groundbreaking Decentralized Physical Infrastructure Network (DePIN) designed for Creative AI.
  * It transforms idle compute power into a robust, scalable network, delivering unmatched speed for creating art with the help of AI.
  * By decentralizing creativity, Sogni Supernet empowers human expression and innovation with unparalleled efficiency and accessibility.
  * The Sogni Supernet is not just another GPU cloud provider; it’s a **comprehensive protocol that provides developers with an API and SDK** to build innovative applications.

* Developed with contributions from artists, creators, and developers, this network integrates advanced technology with human creativity.

## Innovation:

* Users can create content using the available tools or contribute computing power to support the system.
* The platform emphasizes collaboration while maintaining user privacy and autonomy.
* Through this structure, individuals can explore their ideas and participate in a shared creative environment.
* Using the same seed number, prompt, and settings will produce an identical image, with minor differences possibly occurring.
* By making slight modifications to your prompt while keeping the same seed number, you can refine an image while preserving its overall composition.
* This approach proves especially useful when attempting to regenerate an image and adjusting elements such as colors, facial expressions, camera angles, styles, and more.

## Use Case / Features:

* Our Supernet generates 16 AI images as fast as one, in under 5 seconds—outpacing centralized AI tools.
* Our Supernet SDK connects decentralized GPU providers into a single, high-performance AI compute network. No middlemen. No centralization.
* Minimum requirement to provide compute - macOS 14, with an Apple M2 or M1 Pro chip and 16GB of RAM, is recommended.

## Traction:

* We're at 200k+ users and 18M+ renders

## Tokenomics:

* Sogni is airdropping 40,000,000 $SOGNI Tokens shortly after Mainnet Launch.
* Earn $SOGNI by contributing GPU power.
* The Utility Token of Our Community Powered Ecosystem

## Roadmap:

* Phase 1: Launch of Supernet
  * Unlimited AI renders
  * Stress-testing decentralized GPU infrastructure
* Phase 2: Leaderboards + Rewards
  * Start tracking Testnet $SOGNI earned & spent
  * Start to compete for airdrop allocation
  * Start stress-testing our rendering pace on our network
* Phase 3 (NOW): Supernet Worker NFTs & AI Model Royalties
  * Monetize AI model contributions
  * NFT-based licensing for GPU compute
  * Resolving all breaking points of the system before it goes live
  * Snapshot event: March 31st
* Phase 4: Final preparations for Mainnet
  * Testnet accounts migrate
  * $SOGNI Token Generation Event (TGE)

## Business Model:

* 

## Go-To-Market:

* Partnered with Somnia 

## Investors:

* $2M Pre-Seed in March 2025 from
  * Republic - 0
  * **Comma3 Ventures - 5**
  * **Formless Capital - 1**

Title: FR 4 - Sogni.ai

Description:
Sogni AI - 71.90%

Scorecard: [Sogni.ai - FR Scoresheet](https://docs.google.com/spreadsheets/d/1dEsjfrBJCFD_HM8r-y_kVESbt2jJXQ1kjQ38QpqMLyw/edit?usp=sharing)

## Introduction:

* The Most Powerful Creative AI DePIN Protocol
* Live testnet 
* On-demand decentralized GPU power
* Generates 16 images at once within five seconds 
* Create-to-Earn 🤝 Compute-to-Earn
* **A Purpose-Built DePIN Protocol for Creative AI**
* Built on Base
* The Fastest Generative AI DePIN Network

## Solution:

* Sogni is a platform designed to support creative expression through a decentralized **Supernet.**
  * Sogni Supernet is a groundbreaking Decentralized Physical Infrastructure Network (DePIN) designed for Creative AI.
  * It transforms idle compute power into a robust, scalable network, delivering unmatched speed for creating art with the help of AI.
  * By decentralizing creativity, Sogni Supernet empowers human expression and innovation with unparalleled efficiency and accessibility.
  * The Sogni Supernet is not just another GPU cloud provider; it’s a **comprehensive protocol that provides developers with an API and SDK** to build innovative applications.

* Developed with contributions from artists, creators, and developers, this network integrates advanced technology with human creativity.

## Innovation:

* Users can create content using the available tools or contribute computing power to support the system.
* The platform emphasizes collaboration while maintaining user privacy and autonomy.
* Through this structure, individuals can explore their ideas and participate in a shared creative environment.
* Using the same seed number, prompt, and settings will produce an identical image, with minor differences possibly occurring.
* By making slight modifications to your prompt while keeping the same seed number, you can refine an image while preserving its overall composition.
* This approach proves especially useful when attempting to regenerate an image and adjusting elements such as colors, facial expressions, camera angles, styles, and more.

## Use Case / Features:

* Our Supernet generates 16 AI images as fast as one, in under 5 seconds—outpacing centralized AI tools.
* Our Supernet SDK connects decentralized GPU providers into a single, high-performance AI compute network. No middlemen. No centralization.
* Minimum requirement to provide compute - macOS 14, with an Apple M2 or M1 Pro chip and 16GB of RAM, is recommended.

## Traction:

* We're at 200k+ users and 18M+ renders

## Tokenomics:

* Sogni is airdropping 40,000,000 $SOGNI Tokens shortly after Mainnet Launch.
* Earn $SOGNI by contributing GPU power.
* The Utility Token of Our Community Powered Ecosystem

## Roadmap:

* Phase 1: Launch of Supernet
  * Unlimited AI renders
  * Stress-testing decentralized GPU infrastructure
* Phase 2: Leaderboards + Rewards
  * Start tracking Testnet $SOGNI earned & spent
  * Start to compete for airdrop allocation
  * Start stress-testing our rendering pace on our network
* Phase 3 (NOW): Supernet Worker NFTs & AI Model Royalties
  * Monetize AI model contributions
  * NFT-based licensing for GPU compute
  * Resolving all breaking points of the system before it goes live
  * Snapshot event: March 31st
* Phase 4: Final preparations for Mainnet
  * Testnet accounts migrate
  * $SOGNI Token Generation Event (TGE)

data.title: FR 3 - Templar
data.description:
Templar - 58.57%

Scorecard: [Templar - FR Scoresheet](https://docs.google.com/spreadsheets/d/1u5771RKZNmPKEjfItXN7ZZ7f0wVamlc7PXnOvYSTACU/edit?usp=sharing)

## Introduction:

* Cypher Lending
* Built on NEAR

## Solution:

* Templar is a cypher lending protocol that allows users to borrow U.S. dollars (via stablecoins) against their Bitcoin or other assets without centralized intermediaries.
* The Templar Protocol is a decentralized modular borrowing protocol that provides overcollateralized borrows.

## Innovation:

* It uses Multi-Party Computation (MPC) networks and open-source smart contracts to keep collateral secure and independent of third-party control.
* The protocol also highlights a novel yield mechanism derived from the spread on the liquidation as a complement to interest.
* Through these mechanisms, the Templar Protocol provides a platform for borrowing within the NEAR ecosystem and broader multichain DeFi space.

## Use Case / Features:

* Supply and borrow assets from any chain.
* No bridging. No centralized custody. No rehypothecation.
* Key features of the Templar Protocol include the provision of stablecoin borrows with configurable interest rate, repayment duration, collateral ratio, borrowing limits, supported assets, origination fees, liquidation spread fees, liquidation parameters, insurance fund, and incentives.

data.title: FR 2 - PlaysOut
data.description:
PlaysOut - 62.86%

Scorecard: [PlaysOut - FR Scoresheet](https://docs.google.com/spreadsheets/d/13iXPT3MJ_zRpY0fr6U_Ja_mZmUzoMKsFRUrkNgw6_fQ/edit?usp=sharing)

## Introduction:

* The world-leading web3 Mini-Game SDK & Platform.
* BRIDGING WORLDS, ONE MINI GAME AT A TIME
* LAUNCH YOUR GAME ON GLOBALLY POPULAR APPS
* PLAYSOUT’S WEB3 INFRASTRUCTURE FACILITATES THE INTEGRATION OF DIGITAL ASSETS INTO YOUR GAMES ECONOMY SYSTEM.
* Supports Aptos, TON, Taiko, 

## Solution:

* PlaysOut is a global open platform for mini-games, seamlessly integrated with the WeChat ecosystem and designed to empower super apps.
* Playsout equips developers with comprehensive ide tools and a cloud service operation management platform, streamlining the development process and opening up new avenues for monetization. Making it easier than ever to optimise revenue from games!

* USE IDE TOOLS TO DEVELOP & INTEGRATE GAMES.
  * Supporting mainstream game engines such as cocos, egret, laya, and unity3d.
  * One-click packaging.
  * Support for h5 engine.

* OPERATION MANAGEMENT PLATFORM (CLOUD SERVICE)
  * Supporting developers in managing and operating mini games, including resource management, performance monitoring, data analysis, user management, and payment / settlement statistics.

* NATIVE FUNCTION SUPPORT
  * Playsout incorporates a variety of native features, including payment systems, social integrations, file systems, images, nfc and more.
  * Significantly boosting the functionality of mini games.

## Innovation:

* Offering both an independent platform and versatile SDK interfaces, PlaysOut delivers a rich variety of mini-programs and mini-game content, creating new opportunities for developers and users alike.

* **WECHAT - STYLE CONSTRUCTION AND PUBLISHING TECHNOLOGY:**
  * PlaysOut’s mini-game container technology is fully compatible with WeChat’s framework, offering a unique edge in international markets. Enables scalable mini-game launches and is a key strength of our platform.
* **OVER 200 MINI GAME DEVELOPERS: AN EVER EXPLANDING CONTENT LIBRARY:**
  * Offering developers a direct path to international markets, similar to platforms like WeChat and Douyin, with over 200 partners and growing.
* **INTEROPERABILITY: WEB2 + WEB3 PERFORMANCE TO SCALE MINI-GAMES GLOBALLY:**
  * PlaysOut simplifies mini-game integration across platforms, helping developers adapt content for any environment. This drives global scaling, streamlined distribution, a seamless user experience and new opportunities for monetization & engagement.

## Use Case / Features:

* PlaysOut is bridging the gap between Web2 and Web3, empowering developers to unlock new monetization models by building assets on-chain and exploring token-based incentives, NFT integrations, and blockchain-powered economies.
* SEAMLESSLY INTEGRATE GAMES INTO YOUR APP WITH PLAYSOUT
  * Users can enjoy a seamless gaming experience without the need to download or open separate applications.

## Traction:

## Tokenomics:

* 

## Roadmap:

## Business Model:

* 

## Go-To-Market:

* PlaysOut connects the $4B WeChat mini-game market to the global stage, seamlessly integrating Web2 + Web3 ecosystems.
* Unlock new revenue streams, drive deeper engagement, and effortlessly transition to the next generation of digital experiences.

## Investors:

* $7M Seed in March 2025 at a valuation of $70M from

data.title: FR 1 - Kamigotchi
data.description:
Kamigotchi - 61.43%

Scorecard: [Kamigotchi - FR Scoresheet](https://docs.google.com/spreadsheets/d/1iY3SA4bCjJZlk7mi5PzXkelM3f73EmUGx0FbaX-Lv_I/edit?usp=sharing)

## Introduction:

* Kamigotchi is a fully on-chain RPG developed by Asphodel Studio, where players explore a virtual world alongside their pets, called Kamigotchi.
* Live testnet 

## Solution:

* The game combines elements of role-playing, strategy, and resource management, allowing players to farm tokens while navigating various rooms and completing quests.

## Innovation:

* 

## Use Case / Features:

**Key Features:**

* **Gameplay Mechanics:** Players manage their Kamigotchi pets by exploring a map consisting of different rooms, each requiring stamina to enter. Each room has unique characteristics, such as vending machines for minting Kamigotchi or nodes for harvesting the in-game currency, **$MUSU.** The game emphasizes pet development, where players can level up their Kamigotchi and improve their stats.
* **Kamigotchi Types and Stats:** There are four types of Kamigotchi—Normal, Insect, Eerie, and Scrap.
* **Tokens and Economy:** The game features two main tokens:
  * **$KAMI:** This is the primary governance token used for in-game purchases and minting new Kamigotchi.
  * **$MUSU:** Earned through gameplay activities like harvesting at nodes. The relationship between these tokens is still being clarified as the game develops.
* **Development and Launch:** Initially launched on testnet on July 7, 2024, Kamigotchi is built on the MUD v2 framework and operates on the Optimism blockchain. The game aims to create an autonomous world where players can interact with each other and their pets in a decentralized environment.
* **Community Engagement:** While Kamigotchi does not have its own dedicated Discord server, it is part of the Asphodel Studio community. Players can connect through various platforms like Farcaster to engage with others in real-time.

## Traction:

comments.body: ![image.png](https://uploads.linear.app/3973b0e9-3f84-4e56-bc80-5f55fe46609b/f65b83b8-275f-4ea4-bb06-1e55fa3283b3/490c821b-de98-4c77-8067-1aa3cf08df3f)

@manav [https://github.com/token-metrics/tmai-solidity-contracts/blob/payment/test/hardhat/referral.local.test.js](https://github.com/token-metrics/tmai-solidity-contracts/blob/payment/test/hardhat/referral.local.test.js)
Two tests are failing, debugging those to fix.

TMAIPayment

```
Deployment

  ✔ Should get signers (5156ms)

  ✔ Should deploy mock contracts (386ms)

  ✔ Should deploy TMAIPayment contract (78ms)

  ✔ Should deploy ReferralRewards contract (72ms)

  ✔ Should link referral contract with payment contract

Check Initial Configuration

  ✔ Should set the correct owner

  ✔ Should set the correct DAO and treasury addresses

  ✔ Should add the Payment contract as a minter in the NFT contract

Token Management

  ✔ Should allow owner to enable and disable tokens

Process Payment and Subscription Management
```

Encoded Params: { referrer: '0x9965507D1a55bcC2695C58ba16FB37d819B0A4dc' }

```
  ✔ Should process a payment and create a new subscription

  ✔ Should upgrade an existing subscription

  ✔ Should not allow replaying a nonce (38ms)

Revenue Distribution and Admin Functions

  ✔ Should distribute revenue between treasury and DAO

  ✔ Should allow owner to update DAO share

  ✔ Should allow owner to update the SignatureVerifier contract address (73ms)

Withdraw Functions

  ✔ Should allow owner to withdraw tokens

  ✔ Should allow owner to update DAO and Treasury addresses (121ms)

Referral Rewards System

  1) Should log a referral when processing a payment with a valid referrer
```

Referral Data: Result(2) \[

Result(2) \[ 5000000n, 1742217304n \],

Result(2) \[ 5000000n, 1742217306n \]

\]

```
  2) Should allow the referrer to withdraw fees after the delay period

  ✔ Should not log a referral if referral fee is zero

  ✔ Should not allow non-payment contract to log referrals

  ✔ Should reject invalid signatures
```

20 passing (6s)

2 failing

data.title: Give Feedback for Token Metrics AI Chatbot (Ayush)
data.description:
We need to annotate (give feedback) our Token Metrics AI chatbot answers across both Twitter and our production/development environments. This will help us improve the chatbot's performance and gather valuable insights. The CS team should use the provided video tutorial to guide them through the annotation process.

## Objectives

1. Annotate AI chatbot responses on Twitter
2. Annotate AI chatbot responses on the production environment
3. Annotate AI chatbot responses on the development environment

## Steps

1. Review the attached video tutorial on LangSmith annotation

   [Jam | Console logs, network requests, and more](https://jam.dev/c/30d4cd6d-aa1c-4499-be2f-a166294f0f8e)
2. Access the LangSmith dashboard for Token Metrics using your TM email.
3. Identify and categorize chatbot interactions for annotation
4. Provide feedback and annotations for each interaction
5. Use LangSmith's built-in tools to rate response quality, accuracy, and relevance
6. Document any patterns or issues discovered during the annotation process

## Additional Notes

* Ensure consistency in annotation across all team members
* Focus on both positive and negative examples to provide a balanced dataset
* Pay special attention to edge cases and unique user queries
* Regularly discuss findings with the AI development team to inform improvements

## Success Criteria

* Complete annotation of at least 100 interactions each for Twitter, production, and development environments
* Identify at least 5 areas for improvement in chatbot responses
* Provide a summary report of annotation insights and recommendations

## Resources

* Video tutorial: [https://jam.dev/c/30d4cd6d-aa1c-4499-be2f-a166294f0f8e](https://jam.dev/c/30d4cd6d-aa1c-4499-be2f-a166294f0f8e)
* Access credentials for LangSmith dashboard: Use your TM email

Please update this issue with progress and any questions that arise during the annotation process.

data.title: Create Mock Chainlink Contract for Lucky Lottery Mock Unit Testing
data.description:
* **Objective:** Test the Lucky Lottery smart contracts for real-time random number generation and winning ticket selection.
* **Step 1:** Write a **Mock Chainlink contract** to simulate real-time randomness.
* **Step 2:** Integrate the Mock Chainlink contract with Lucky Lottery contracts.
* **Step 3:** Implement unit tests for:
  * Random number generation.
  * Selection of winning ticket ID.
* **Step 4:** Execute and verify the test cases to ensure correctness.
* **Step 5:** Debug and refine the implementation as needed.

data.title: Resolved Rippling Payroll System Bug
data.description:
Identified and addressed a sudden issue within Rippling that affected employee payroll information.

* Diagnosed and escalated a **payroll data bug** affecting multiple employees.
* After the initial fix, a secondary issue occurred where many employees received emails resembling **phishing or scam messages**.
* Actively coordinated with Rippling support to **investigate, isolate the root cause**, and confirm system integrity.
* Communicated with internal stakeholders to reassure employees and ensure no data breach occurred.

parent.title: AI app for Slack

comments.body:
What I have done so far:

1. A flow to analyze a user's prompt to decide what type of actions does that need (simple prompt, additional actions).
2. A set of tools for AI to use:
   1. A function to get data from Postgresql database
   2. a function to search for slack's channels parameters
   3. a function to retrieve different type of URLs (currently support public url, X, github)
   4. A Postgresql database to store Linear data and an embedding database of that.

For the current stage, the agent was able to responds to different kinds of prompts from me:

1. Normal prompt like: chatting with chatGPT,…

   ![image.png](https://uploads.linear.app/3973b0e9-3f84-4e56-bc80-5f55fe46609b/e9c98013-d9d8-453a-8aa6-cbfaf4a8013e/9230685e-565b-4d35-8a17-e2963051186a)
2. A prompt that requires searching within Slack's channel: What did Anki achieved last week
3. A prompt that requires searching Slack's history and image analysis:

![image.png](https://uploads.linear.app/3973b0e9-3f84-4e56-bc80-5f55fe46609b/b4ff7182-47b3-4db7-bf58-f9db1f247213/19d73997-d392-4a0d-ad7a-5c12f7033020)

4. A prompt includes an URL (what do you think about this repo? \[github_url\]:

![image.png](https://uploads.linear.app/3973b0e9-3f84-4e56-bc80-5f55fe46609b/88ba9641-5045-4256-a040-bedad11e4e99/7aa199aa-4e90-4bb0-9c71-507f16fe0b16)

5. A prompt requires RAG on Linear database using Postgresql and pgvectorscale (open-sourced) to do RAG (still buggy):

The problem I'm having with this is dealing with Postgresql database to create a meaningful/relational database to create embeddings and retrieve and rerank the data:

![image.png](https://uploads.linear.app/3973b0e9-3f84-4e56-bc80-5f55fe46609b/735ff231-455c-4182-8482-a21eea108b60/479577b6-c59e-4acd-ac47-6c5e03bbb45d)

Scope:

the goal of this AI app is for everyone to retrieves data in Slack including our tools: Linear, Github, X.

issues.full_context: Title: Updates on the current stage

parent.title: Expand functionalities of Research2Post Agent

comments.body: @phat great, thanks for fixing!
@ian

This one has also been done. Before the problem was that I'm setting the retry number and retry time too long for the agent when it hits error of posting to Twitter. But I noticed that there's no need to do that for rate limit because we would usually need to wait for 2 hours.

And because X does not allow us to post a whole thread, instead we would have to post subsequent posts as a comment to the previous post. Then how are we handling if the thread is posted in half (5/9 posts) and then crash? The agent will delete every posts immediately that have already been published to avoid that kind of posts. It will will wait again for rate limit

**Prompt for AI to Generate Interesting Replies to X Posts (No Hashtags)**

"You are an expert social media engagement strategist and a creative AI assistant designed to generate compelling, engaging, and impression-gaining replies to posts on X (Twitter). Your audience consists of crypto traders, AI enthusiasts, and finance professionals who follow accounts related to cryptocurrency, artificial intelligence, and financial markets. These accounts include \[list of usernames, e.g., @\_kaitoai, @aixbt_agent, @elonmusk, @OpenAI, @Bloomberg, etc., up to 183 usernames from the combined crypto, AI, and finance list provided earlier\].

Your task is to craft a reply to a hypothetical or specific X post from one of these accounts, ensuring the reply is:

1. **Relevant**: Directly ties to the post’s content, whether it’s about crypto trends, AI innovations, financial market updates, or related topics.
2. **Engaging**: Uses humor, curiosity, or thought-provoking questions to encourage likes, retweets, and replies, increasing impressions, without relying on hashtags.
3. **Insightful**: Offers valuable insight, data, or a unique perspective that resonates with the audience’s interests in crypto, AI, or finance.
4. **Concise**: Fits within X’s character limit (280 characters) while remaining impactful.
5. **Trend-Aware**: Incorporates current trends, memes, or jargon popular among crypto traders, AI communities, or finance professionals (e.g., “HODL,” “AI disruption,” “bull run,” “market sentiment”) without using hashtags.
6. **Non-Promotional**: Avoids overt self-promotion or spam; focuses on adding value to the conversation.

Here’s an example to guide you:

* **Hypothetical Post**: @elonmusk: ‘Neuralink’s AI progress could revolutionize finance. Thoughts?’
* **AI-Generated Reply**: ‘@elonmusk Wild! Could AI-driven trading outpace crypto HODLers? Neuralink + DeFi = next bull run?’

Now, generate 5 unique, creative replies for the following hypothetical X post from one of the listed accounts (e.g., @\_kaitoai, @OpenAI, or @Bloomberg). Use the post below as the basis:

* **Hypothetical Post**: @\_kaitoai: ‘Accounts with the highest mindshare this week: @aixbt_agent leading the pack in crypto AI. What’s driving this?’

Ensure each reply is distinct, engaging, and optimized for impressions on X, while staying within the 280-character limit. Use emojis, questions, and a conversational tone to attract attention from crypto traders, AI enthusiasts, and finance pros, but do not include hashtags."

* **No Hashtags**: Removes hashtags based on your input, aligning with the idea that they may be less effective in 2025, as suggested by web results indicating a shift in social media strategies (e.g., focusing on content quality, timeliness, and engagement over hashtags).
* **Engagement Focus**: Emphasizes other engagement drivers like emojis, questions, and trendy jargon to maintain visibility and interaction on X.
* **Relevance**: Continues to target the same audience (crypto traders, AI enthusiasts, finance pros) and accounts, ensuring the replies remain valuable and on-topic.
* **Flexibility**: You can still swap in any hypothetical or real post from the listed accounts, making it reusable for different scenarios.

data.title: feature base and ai clip review
data.description:
Groomed Issue:

**Title:** Feature Base Enhancement and AI Clip Review Integration

**Description:** Develop a centralized feature repository and integrate an AI-powered clip review system to streamline feature management and automate the quality assessment of media clips.

**Business Rationale:** Creating a unified feature base will improve feature tracking, collaboration, and development efficiency. Implementing AI-driven clip review will enhance content quality, reduce manual review time, and ensure consistency, ultimately leading to higher user satisfaction and operational cost savings.

**Acceptance Criteria:**

1. A centralized feature repository is established, allowing team members to add, update, and track features seamlessly.
2. The AI clip review system is integrated and capable of automatically evaluating clips based on predefined quality and compliance criteria.
3. The AI system provides actionable feedback and generates reports on clip assessments.
4. Users can manually override AI decisions and provide additional input where necessary.
5. Comprehensive documentation and training materials are available to support team adoption and usage of both the feature repository and AI clip review system.

comments.body: This issue has been reviewed and updated using AI.

data.title: test party
data.description:
Groomed Issue:

**Title:** Test Party

**Description:**  
Create a feature that allows users to organize and manage test parties within the application. This functionality should enable scheduling, inviting participants, and tracking attendance for testing purposes.

**Business Rationale:**  
Implementing a test party feature will facilitate effective testing of event management workflows, ensuring that the system functions correctly before deploying to production. This reduces potential bugs and enhances user satisfaction by providing a reliable platform.

**Acceptance Criteria:**

1. Users can create a test party by specifying date, time, and location.
2. Invitations can be sent to selected participants via email or in-app notifications.
3. Participants can RSVP to the test party.
4. Organizers can view and manage the list of attendees.
5. Test party data is isolated from live event data to prevent conflicts.

**Title:** Adjustments to Indices Launch Video

**Description:** Revise the existing Indices launch video to improve visual quality and ensure consistency with the latest branding guidelines. This includes updating graphics, enhancing animations, and incorporating feedback from the marketing team.
